mean_cn: n. 商标，特征；  vt. 给（商品）标上商标
mean_en: something (such as a word) that identifies a particular company's product and cannot be used by another company without permission
word_etyma: trade贸易+mark记号，符号 → 商标
short_phrase: trademark the brand name and logo
sentence: A company will want to trademark its name and its best-known advertising slogans.
sentence_trans: 公司会想给商品和著名的广告语都标上商标。
